tool_description: Updates existing customer profile data with validation, version control, and privacy compliance checks.

update_fields.description: JSON string of fields to update with new values

update_reason.description: Reason for update: customer_request, admin_correction, system_sync, or data_enrichment

override_privacy.description: Whether to override privacy restrictions for admin updates

validate_changes.description: Whether to validate updated data against business rules

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid update_fields format: Provide properly formatted JSON string with field updates.
Invalid update_reason: Use one of [customer_request, admin_correction, system_sync, data_enrichment].
Validation failed: Updated data does not meet validation requirements.
Privacy violation: Update conflicts with customer privacy settings and override not authorized.
Read-only field: Some fields cannot be updated through this interface.
usage: Provide customer_id, update_fields as JSON, and update_reason. The tool validates changes and updates the profile while maintaining audit trail.

update_successful.description: Whether the update operation completed successfully

updated_fields.description: List of fields that were actually updated

version_number.description: New profile version number after update
